channel.title: [562]Client Error Loading Profile, Please Contact Customer Service
channel.description: The subject says it all, but in more detail: When I login the FIRST time, the client logs in to the game with no problems. However, the second time i try it. I get the error which is "Error Loading Profile, Please Contact Customer Service". The Client does not give any errors, neither does the Server.

item.title: [562]Client Error Loading Profile, Please Contact Customer Service
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

The subject says it all, but in more detail: When I login the FIRST time, the client logs in to the game with no problems. However, the second time i try it. I get the error which is “Error Loading Profile, Please Contact Customer Service”. The Client does not give any errors, neither does the Server.

Read full topic
